docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Citing what they call serious financial difficulties, two large private hospitals in upper Manhattan have closed outpatient pharmacies that subsidized the cost of medicine for thousands of poor people.

headline.main: 2 Manhattan Hospitals Shut Pharmacies Used by Needy
